2.t: Do you know what al-tariq is?

4.t: There is no soul which is not guarded (by the two angels who record all of its deeds).

5.t: Let the human being reflect that from what he has been created.

6.t: He has been created from an ejected drop of fluid

7.t: which comes out of the loins and ribs.

8.t: God has all power to resurrect him.

9.t: On the day when all secrets will be made public,

10.t: he will have no power, nor anyone to help him.
10.tr: Famaa lahoo min quwwatinw Wa-laa naasir

13.t: the Quran is the final word,

14.t: and it is certainly not a jest.

16.t: but I too plan against them.

17.t: Give respite to the disbelievers and leave them alone for a while.
